testcase.name: There should be an option to update email id adding "@" sign and ".com"
testcase.system-out: Given user open Gmi Bank website............................................passed When user click on account menu.............................................passed And click on sign in tab....................................................passed When user enter username "username".........................................passed And user enter password "password"..........................................passed Then click on sign in button................................................passed Then verify user is on home page............................................passed When user click on user icon................................................passed And click on user info tab..................................................passed And user enter email "e.techproed@gmail.com"................................passed And user click on save button...............................................passed Then verify email address contains @ and .com...............................passed
